Totally there with you. I have immune-compromised family members, parents over 65 and a 3 month old. My husband and I are still climbing out of the hold my unpaid maternity leave put us in... Okay so the original comment was removed, this has turned into a debate on BC which has nothing, whatsoever to do with the OP and I can‚Äôt see anyone commenting about whether this guy or the neighbor was the a-hole. I‚Äôm gonna say both are TA. The neighbor should have minded his own GD business but you didn‚Äôt need to sink to his level. And ya I get it was early and you‚Äôre embarrassed by the situation. NTA IN ANY WAY SHAPE OR FORM. What a horrible, selfish monster she is. I am so unbelievably sorry you had to go through a miscarriage and deal with her shitbaggery on top of it. Sending healing and good vibes to you and your family.
